titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John Audley, Album
titlestmt.author: by Beinecke Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday November 29, 2018 at 05:24
profiledesc.descrules: translation missing: en.enumerations.resource_finding_aid_description_rules.beinecke manuscript unit archival processing manual

did.unittitle: [Album containing 165 letters from various correspondents, addressed to John Audley, Chancellor of the Archdiocese of York, and to his father, Edward Audley of Huntington]

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Chief topics in the letters are ecclesiastical affairs in the York diocese and affairs of Cambridge University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: For provenance information, consult the appropriate curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Osborn c195 is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John Audley, Album. James Marshall and Marie-Louise Osborn Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This finding aid was produced from a previously existing list or card set. All pertinent bibliographical information has been retained; the volume may contain additional unlisted material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The following finding aid is a complete inventory of the contents of Osborn c195. This list was reformatted from previously existing cataloging.

195/136

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
Wimpole
2 p.; 20 x 16 cm.
One of a series Audley sent out
campaigning for election to
parliament as member from Cambridge
University; there were many
tentative candidates, including
Prior, who withdrew Oct. 15; see
also Osborn Shelves c 195 numbers:
39, 38, 64-67, 70, 111, 125,
151, 171.
